function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increase in non-contact interaction leading to migration of community activities to virtual space","Impact":"Decreased use of physical community service facilities, potentially reducing community interaction and increasing isolation","Mitigation":"Promotion of hybrid community spaces that integrate virtual and physical components to maintain community interaction and reduce isolation","Technologies":"Virtual reality, augmented reality, online communication platforms","People":"Community residents, especially those at risk of isolation","Owner":"Community planning authorities and developers"},{"Description":"Composite space and non-contact interaction as the basis of community life post-epidemic","Impact":"Potential long-term reliance on virtual spaces for community interaction, leading to decreased physical social interaction and impact on mental health","Mitigation":"Education and awareness programs on the importance of physical community interaction, promotion of balanced use of virtual and physical spaces","Technologies":"Public health campaigns, community engagement platforms, mental health support services","People":"Community residents, mental health professionals","Owner":"Public health organizations, community support groups"},{"Description":"Complex and significant changes in community organization and space configuration","Impact":"Challenges in adapting physical community spaces to meet new requirements, potential inefficiencies in community planning and development","Mitigation":"Flexible and adaptive urban planning strategies, dynamic spatial reorganization, stakeholder engagement in planning process","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis, urban planning software, community feedback systems","People":"Urban planners, community developers, stakeholders","Owner":"Urban planning authorities, community development organizations"}]}
